com.leenmeij.app.models

Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leenmeij.app.models.Vehicle

  • public class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all the database features for the vehicle model like: Inserting, updating, deleting and arraylists. Here we also check if the vehicle can be rented
    Author:
    Deam Kop(s1075228), Nick Bosland
